OOC: 
Hello! :) 
Airly, if you can, please=A0respond to the twin missiles f=
lying at Hydras' base, and any=A0response that the base may have. I am sure=
 Perceptor has detected them approaching on base scanners??? They are not i=
nvisible, infact they are really bright and firey! :) 
I don't want to pose=
 for your base, as it is your creation and under your control. Then I can h=
ave the minions continue on in thier onslaught! >:)
Thanks
Preston
(Da'mini=
on)

Subject: Minions over the Black Fortress


As the battle of Autobot vs Dece=
pticon, Maximal vs Predicon continued 
to rage near the black Fortress - hi=
gh over ahead, the same clouds 
that originally disgorged Megatron continue=
d to roll and twist as 
dark winds thrust through them, ripping at them lik=
e some unseen 
claws.

In eerie silence small motes of inky blackness seeme=
d to appear from 
out of the broiling clouds. First only a few sprinkled am=
idst the 
skies like soot, but then all too quickly they grew in both numbe=
r 
and size!

Then two bright lights seemed to streak from the group, like =
shooting 
stars bursting from amidst the clouds. As they passed through the=
 
group the motes of black are briefly lit, revealing the distinctive 
oblo=
ng shape of Scourge's hunters, trackers and killers! Many 
centuries from t=
oday humans will dare to call them soap-dishes with 
cannons, but today the=
y have arrived and are intent upon destruction!

As the twin lights pass ou=
t into the open skies they only become 
brighter and more powerful as their=
 pod like shapes reveal their true 
character: MISSILES!! Like twin suns th=
ey streak forward, directing 
their destructive power down upon Hydras' bas=
e, even as the rest of 
the approaching host continues inexorably onward!

=
The Minions have arrived!!!!

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt"><P>OOC: </P>
<P> </P>
<P>Hello! :) </P>
<P> </P>
<P>Airly, if you can, please respond to the twin missiles flying at Hydras' base, and any response that the base may have. I am sure Perceptor has detected them approaching on base scanners??? They are not invisible, infact they are really bright and firey! :) </P>
<P> </P>
<P>I don't want to pose for your base, as it is your creation and under your control. Then I can have the minions continue on in thier onslaught! >:)</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Thanks</P>
<P>Preston</P>
<P>(Da'minion)</P>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"><BR><BR>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; MARGIN: 5px 0px 5px 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">----- Original Message ----<BR>From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2008 4:50:08 PM<BR>Subject: Minions over the Black Fortress<BR><BR>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>As the battle of Autobot vs Decepticon, Maximal vs Predicon continued <BR>to rage near the black Fortress - high over ahead, the same clouds <BR>that originally disgorged Megatron continued to roll and twist as <BR>dark winds thrust through them, ripping at them like some unseen <BR>claws.<BR><BR>In eerie silence small motes of inky blackness seemed to appear from <BR>out of the broiling clouds. First only a few sprinkled amidst the <BR>skies like soot, but then all too quickly they grew in both number <BR>and size!<BR><BR>Then two bright lights seemed to streak from the group, like shooting <BR>stars bursting from amidst the clouds. As they passed through the <BR>group the motes of black are briefly lit, revealing the distinctive <BR>oblong shape of Scourge's hunters, trackers and killers! Many <BR>centuries from today humans will dare to call them soap-dishes with <BR>cannons, but today they have arrived and are intent upon destruction!<BR><BR>As
 the twin lights pass out into the open skies they only become <BR>brighter and more powerful as their pod like shapes reveal their true <BR>character: MISSILES!! Like twin suns they streak forward, directing <BR>their destructive power down upon Hydras' base, even as the rest of <BR>the approaching host continues inexorably onward!<BR><BR>The Minions have arrived!!!!<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></DIV></div><br>



      </body></html>
